name: .CDSZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .CDSZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A CDSZ file is a slide show created by CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM, a Windows and macOS diagramming application. It contains one or more pages of diagrams, drawings, flowcharts, etc., and also stores settings, such as the autoplay interval and whether or not it loops. ConceptDraw DIAGRAM users save diagrams as CDSZ slide shows to present them to an audience.

content: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM is a diagramming application for amateur and professional users. You can create various types of simple and complex diagrams, such as plans for a weekend vacation or the numerous steps required to build a house.

CS Odessa introduced the CDSZ format when it released version 10 of CS Odessa ConceptDraw PRO (and also changed the name of the software to ConceptDraw DIAGRAM). Version 9 and earlier of CS Odessa ConceptDraw PRO uses the .CDS file format to save slide shows. To save a slide show as a CDSZ slide show, select File → Save As..., then choose ConceptDraw CDSZ SlideShow from the "File Format" dropdown menu.

instructions: You can open CDSZ files with CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM in Windows and macOS. To open a CDSZ file, select File → Open.
CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM can convert CDSZ files to various file types, including the following formats:
